title: Healthcare Practical Skills Enhancement: Project-Based Learning Program for Improving Adolescent Mental Health

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Key types of adolescent mental health issues (anxiety, depression, etc.) and influencing factors can be systematically explained
A mental health improvement app prototype can be developed by applying the ADDIE model-based instructional design process
A report analyzing the visual effectiveness and usability of app design can be written using user experience (UX) evaluation metrics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
